name: Day 11: Scroll to
description:
Welcome to day 11 of 15 in the Figma prototype challenge! In this challenge you will be using Scroll to, to create an easy to navigate carousel:

  1. A gif demonstrating the animation
  2. A workspace for you to build your prototype
  3. The built out prototype to use as reference
  4. Community examples demonstrating other applications of the feature


Feel free to follow the prompt or create a new, unique prototype of your own. Whatever you choose to do, don't forget to post a Remix or publish a new Community File with the tag FigmaPrototypeChallenge! Happy prototyping! ðŸŽ‰
